|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
|`UserAudits` |Audit Logs |[TOUserAudits](/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/touseraudits)<p>Contains all Toolchain orchestrator API Server audit logs including the events generated as a result of interactions with any external system or toolchain. These events are useful for monitoring all the interactions with the Toolchain orchestrator API server and between Toolchain orchestrator and external orchestrated targets, e.g. Kubernetes. Requires Diagnostic Settings to use the Resource Specific destination table.|Yes|No|[Queries](/azure/azure-monitor/reference/queries/touseraudits)|Yes |
|`UserDiagnostics` |Diagnostic Logs |[TOUserDiagnostics](/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/touserdiagnostics)<p>Contains all Toolchain orchestrator API Server user diagnostics logs. These events are useful for diagnose failed requests on Toolchain orchestrator. Requires Diagnostic Settings to use the Resource Specific destination table.|Yes|No|[Queries](/azure/azure-monitor/reference/queries/touserdiagnostics)|Yes |
